EmailTemplate.name: Project Memo Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: Project Memo Approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Please find attached the information regarding your proposed project with {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Partner__c}. If the information is correct, please open the attachment, sign next to your name at the top, and reply to this email with a copy of the Memo. If you have any proposed changes, please feel free to contact {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Officer__c}.
Thank you.
